model.name: rollback
model.title: Rollback
model.description: Forces a rollback by stopping routing the message
model.label: eip,routing

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route during build time. Once an EIP has been disabled then it cannot be enabled later at runtime.

message.description: Message to use in rollback exception

markRollbackOnly.description: Mark the transaction for rollback only (cannot be overruled to commit)

markRollbackOnlyLast.label: advanced
markRollbackOnlyLast.description: Mark only last sub transaction for rollback only. When using sub transactions (if the transaction manager support this)
